title: Chitwan Jungle Stay - 4 Days
description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Chitwan National Park with an authentic jungle stay experience. Encounter diverse wildlife including rhinos, tigers, elephants and enjoy traditional Tharu culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Tharu Culture
itinerary.description: Arrive in Chitwan and check into jungle resort. Lunch followed by Tharu village tour to experience local lifestyle. Evening Tharu cultural dance program with traditional dinner.

itinerary.title: Jungle Safari Adventures
itinerary.description: Early morning jeep safari in core jungle area for tiger and rhino spotting. Return for breakfast. Afternoon canoe ride on Rapti River followed by jungle walking safari. Evening leisure at resort.

itinerary.title: Elephant Activities and Nature Walk
itinerary.description: Morning visit to Elephant Breeding Center to learn about conservation efforts. Elephant safari through grasslands. Afternoon bird watching and nature walk. Sunset views from watchtower.

itinerary.title: Final Safari and Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning final safari opportunity for any missed wildlife sightings. Return for breakfast and checkout. Departure with unforgettable jungle memories.

fitness_requirements: Basic fitness required for walking activities.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 5 days before departure
